transcript:
Customer: screen share kahan se hota hai?
Customer: Manish screen share kahan se hota hai?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Sir.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Haan sir abhi meri mam se baat hui hogi aapki main Vikrant Kumar bol raha hun IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: To abhi sir kya problem aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Are bylead bylead nahi dikhai de raha kitna bylead bachi kya hai sunday ka proper kuch bhi nahi dikha raha iske andar.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha to abhi sir apna na screen share kariyega theek hai aap IndiaMART open kariye.
Customer: Haan kar liya.
Executive: Haan abhi dekhiye aap three dot pe click karenge waha pe screen share ka option aayega jahan pe ha likha hua hai na theek hai ha likha hua hoga theek hai waha click karenge.
Executive: Click kariye.
Customer: Haan screen share kuch nahi likha hua hai sir.
Executive: Haan nahi aap waha pe jab three line pe click karenge right side.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Click karenge na to phir scroll karenge aur scroll kariye.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Account manager ka option aa raha hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ab dekhiye account manager pe click karenge phir aayega share screen now.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan click kar dijiye.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hua sir?
Customer: Haan kar diya maine bhi.
Executive: Haan ek minute sir main bhi visible nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Aapke side network proper hai?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: [inaudible] sir abhi.
Executive: Ek minute sir aapki screen dikh nahi rahi hai.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: Sir hello ek bar ek bar cut karke na phir se click kariye.
Customer: Kar diya already on bata raha hai yaha pe.
Executive: Achcha already on hai.
Executive: Actually main aapko ek google meet ka link send karu usko join kariyega na theek hai phir main aapko a to z jitna bhi problem kya sir ek minute ruko main return karta hun.
Executive: Achcha theek hai.
Customer: Dekho aaya kya abhi.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ho gaya sir?
Customer: Ho gaya na abhi stop likha hua aa raha hai yaha pe.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Haan sir aa gaya hai aap IndiaMART pe hi ho na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan ab back aaiye back aaiye byleads pe click kariye.
Customer: Lo.
Executive: Haan haan abhi sir phir se byleads pe click kariye to niche aapko jo byleads dikh raha hai na home ke bagal mein byleads dikh raha hoga aapko.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan byleads pe click kariye.
Customer: Kar diya.
Executive: [unintelligible] waha pe upar nahi sir [unintelligible] upar nahi dekhiye niche aapko home dikh raha hoga na home likha hua hai phir byleads likha hua hai deed manager likha hua hai [unintelligible] abhi yaha pe click kar de aap.
Executive: Okay ab bataiye byleads mein kya problem hai jaise abhi dekhiye ye aaya na praksham Andhra Pradesh ka 5 se 10 lakh ka gender male.
Executive: Abhi dekhiye 2 se 5 lakh ka badi badi leads dikh rahi hai.
Customer: Haan isme kya haan to abhi isme kya problem aa rahi hai bataiye.
Customer: Are matlab ki kitni bylead bachi hai mere paas mein ye nahi dikha raha iske andar.
Executive: Achcha theek theek hai aap yaha pe upar three dot pe click kariye.
Customer: Ye lo three dot pe jo mic ke mic ke bagal nahi is side ye three line ho gaya uske is side mein three dots hoga opposite side mein.
Executive: Three dots pe karna.
Customer: Haan isko back aaiye three dot pe click kariye aap ye to three line ho gaya na sir haan ek side.
Customer: Haan haan ek side sir.
Customer: Daaye side haan dekhiye.
Executive: Bylead balance aapko dikh raha hai?
Customer: Haan abhi dekhiye India bylead aapke paas nau bachi hui daily bonus aapke paas ek bachi hui hai.
Executive: Theek hai weekly jo hai weekly dekhiye aapke paas theek hai do type ki byleads milti hai theek hai ek weekly milti hai ek bonus milti hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai weekly milti hai aapko 10 byleads milti hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai to total aapko 17 milti hai per week.
Customer: Per week.
Executive: Per week 17 milti hai haan theek hai haan ye jo 17 milti hai do term mein milti hai pehle to aapko sunday ko morning 12:01 am pe 10 mil jayengi theek hai 10 aur ek daily wali 11.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai ye aur jo left hoti hai jo 10 milengi weekly wali na wo saturday ko left ho jayengi haan haan theek hai saturday night mein 11:59 pe pm pe ye left ho jayengi ye 10 ho gayi aur jo aapko daily bonus milti hai samajh rahe hain jo daily aapko milti hai wo daily aapko morning mein milengi aur night mein left ho jayengi to isi tarah jo aapko dikh raha hoga daily bonus aapko ek dikh raha hai ek mein se bhi ek bachi hui hai aur jo weekly dikh raha hai aapko 10 mein se aath bachi hui hai.
Customer: To sir kehne ka matlab ye hai ki 17 bylead mahine ki milti hai hafte ki milti hai to matlab ye man lo aaj use nahi kiya daily bonus to wo to agle din use kar sakte hain na.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi nahi aapko main wahi bata raha hun na ki morning milegi agar aap use nahi karte ho night mein 11:59 pm pe left ho jayengi matlab raat mein.
Customer: Ek bylead to daily use karni hi hai.
Executive: Haan ek bylead daily aapko use karni hi hai nahi to wo left ho jayega.
Customer: Okay sir okay.
Executive: Aur sir?
Customer: Aur kuch nahi chahiye thoda aur sir main bahar ki bylead nahi aa rahi.
Customer: Bahar ki matlab kitni door ki south ki south ki chahiye aapko lead south ki south ki lead nahi aa rahi.
Executive: Achcha nahi sir abhi to maine dekha aapko Andhra Pradesh ke dikh raha tha.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan to dekho actually mein aur ek baat hai na sir ko aap na meri call bhi nahi receive karte main aapko kafi time call karta hun.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Haan to jaise jo bhi problem hoti hai mera account manager bol rahe ho kya haan sir waha pe aap name mera nahi dekhe Vikrant Kumar abhi jo gaye the account manager ke option pe haan haan haan dekho yahi to hota hai jaise ki aap bike chalate ho hello haan jaise aap bike chalate ho bike ko bhi aapke do teen mahine mein ek bar servicing ki zarurat padti hai theek hai ye bhi ek AI app pe work karta hai theek hai isko bhi monthly mein ek bar isko matlab service karna hota hai proper jo a to z hota hai aap kahan deal karte ho theek hai har month mein kuch byleads hoti hai na to kya hota hai ki kuch byleads bhi hoti hai matlab AI base pe hota hai kuch jo hamara software problem hota hai uski wajah se kuch jo aapki setting hoti hai wo mismatch ho jati hai haan haan to isliye hum aapko har month call karte hain as a servicing call ke liye taki usme jo bhi aapki problem ho aap hume bataye hum usko resolve kare haan haan ya uske alava aapko agar beech mein bhi koi call kar matlab aapko problem hoti hai aap account manager ke option ja ke aap mujhe call kar sakte ho waha pe jaise screen share ka option tha waise hi call ka bhi option hai call ka bhi option hai haan call ka bhi option hai haan haan call ka message ka jaise bhi share screen ka option tha uske upar call ka option hoga chat whatsapp ke option hoga kuch bhi sir wo mujhe kar sakte hain mera personal number bhi aap likh dijiye ek bar ji number bataiye sir aap us number pe message kijiye na sir achcha theek hai main aapko message wale number pe aapko karna hai na haan haan ab iske alava aur koi aapke paas problem ki jo main matlab koi problem nahi hai sir theek hai baki matlab main aapko 15 se 20 din pe call karunga jo bhi aap problem hoga mujhe bata dijiyega agar aap free bhi nahi ho haan sir wo aise bol raha hun ki abhi kitne mahine ka package baki hai aapka ek minute sir haan sir ye march tak hai aapka kitna march march tak theek hai abhi teen char mahine ka hai haan haan ab isko sir matlab ki isko upgrade karna chahte hain abhi services ko nahi sir abhi phir march ke mahine mein update karwaenge first march mein aur ek baat hai sir achcha ek bar ye jo aapki barbari goat hai hmm hmm theek hai aap aapke catalog mein add nahi hai okay sir add kijiye sir achcha isko aap hum add kar de okay ek minute haan jo aapke paas calls aati hai calls pe jyada response hota hai ki byleads pe byleads byleads pe aur calls pe customer kya bolte hai calls pe kuch khasi baat hoti hai matlab hota hai sir lekin bahut kam hota hai achcha ab monthly meeting kitni ho jati hongi sir matlab kitne aapke jo abhi to teen char mahine se koi order hi nahi aa raha achcha teen char mahine se koi order nahi aa raha haan okay chaliye i mean near about kis month mein kitna gaya tha kya hua kis month mein kitna gaya tha us hisab se hum log dekh lenge nahi tha kuch bhi nahi gaya tha okay theek koi order hi nahi mil raha abhi to achcha kya hota hai hum log dekhte hain sir jis month mein aapki deal hui hoti hai na usi month ke road hum log paas jo aapka hota hai past mein aapne kya kya kiya hai theek hai to jis month mein achi khasi deal hui hoti hai na usi month ke according hum aapka app ko run karte hain hmm hmm taki matlab agar last mein jitna lijiye aapko august mein deal mili hoti thi theek hai to august ka hum log aapka history nikalte hain aapne history mein kaise us time use kiya tha to same it is haan waise hi aapko december mein bhi january mein bhi wahi prakar ke app ko run karte hain hmm hmm haan to agar aapko kisi month mein achcha deal mila hoga to hum bata sakte hain ki ha mujhe is month mein achcha deal mila hum usi hisab se aapka app ko design karenge jaisa aa hi nahi raha na abhi koi bylead sir okay okay okay theek hai sir baki main aapko hi likhta hun na jo aapki barbari jo haan bataiye isme mere ko jyada bital ka aisa lead chahiye bital haan okay theek hai to bital aap usi ke lead consume kariyega aapko mil nahi raha na sir lead theek hai main ek bar search karunga theek hai past me aap jayenge ek bar phir se apna screen share kariye ek minute sir aise hi bata dijiye na wo to main kar lunga ab achcha dekhenge jab byleads pe aap jate hain na sir hmm hmm jab byleads pe upar click kar denge to right side aapko dikh raha hoga tender dikh raha hoga hmm tender dikh raha hai haan tender ke bagal mein ek right side scroll karne ka arrow dikh raha hoga right side scroll karne ka ab waha pe click karenge to past ka option open ho jayega waha pe right side jo hai scroll karne wala waha pe past ek bar click karenge to past likha hua aayega haan likha hua hai na waha pe click kariye mere ko bata do sir main kar lunga ek minute ruko haan wahi to haan wahi main bol raha hun sir batao kaise kare click karo haan aap byleads niche click kariye byleads ke niche byleads pe click kariye byleads pe abhi dekhiye upar aapko dikh raha hoga jaise ki past matlab transaction dikh raha hoga tender dikh raha hoga tender dikh raha hai dikh raha hai tender tender upar list dikh raha hoga recent relevant and tenders dikh raha hoga aapko recent catalog view aisa likha haan uske bagal mein tender dikh raha hoga haan tenders tenders ke bagal mein dekhiye ek chota sa arrow bana hoga right side scroll karne ka tender pe click karna hai kya nahi tender ke bagal mein scroll karne ka button hoga sir matlab sign hoga past likha hua hai iske button mein haan past pe haan past pe click kariye aap tenders ke bagal mein past likha raha tha past haan kar diya sir okay abhi dekhiye aapko kuch leads dikh rahi hongi haan likha hua hai sold haan wo uske niche likha hoga i am interested i am interested haan theek hai to sir ye wo list hoti hai na jisko aap consume nahi kar pate hain theek hai aur wo jisko aap consume nahi kar pate hain aur wo list sold out are sala ek minute haan sir ek minute thodi baat theek hai theek hai theek hai kis pe click kare bolo sir i am interested haan to pehle baat samajhiye theek hai kya hota hai sir ye wo list hai jisko aap consume nahi kiye hain theek hai aur wo sold out ho jati hai jaise kuch list achi hoti hai na to aate hi sold out ho jati hai usko paanch supplier us pe click kar lete hain sold out ho jati hai to agar aapko lagta hai ki hamare paas nahi nahi aayegi nahi kam se kam 50 buyer jude hue hain iske aapke indian 50 to wo to sabke paas hi jayegi na lead to haan sir wo to sabke paas jayegi aap kisi ne ek bande ne pehle hi utha liya us lead ko haan to wo lead waha pe rahegi ya automatic gayab ho jayegi nahi nahi paanch paanch paanch paanch supplier agar baat us pe i contact ban aap click kar lenge paanch supplier to wo waha se gayab ho jayegi phir wo koi dusra chata aadmi usse contact chata nahi chata le hi nahi sakta hai sir haan aur jo aapke paas calls aati hai na wo calls keval aap hi ke paas aati hai calls to personally khud ke paas hi aati hai haan personally aapke paas aati hai hmm hmm to wahi hai jaise man lijiye paanch supplier ne kisi lead pe baat kar li wo lead sachi thi theek hai kisi achi category ke to aapke paas nahi aayi hai to aapko lagta hai ki ai ai leads mere paas aaye to waha pe i am interested click kar denge to ai leads aapke paas bhi aana lagengi matlab notification uska badh jayega boost ho jayega jise kehte hain theek hai to yaha pe aap kar lijiyega theek hai sir aur sir kuch aur kuch nahi chahiye theek hai sir matlab is recording main abhi call aap complete karta hun ki maine aapke matlab catalog kuch work kiya theek hai to hamare liye bhi aapke matlab mail id pe whatsapp bhi ek feedback jayega theek hai to i hope ki aap waha pe 35 click karenge theek hai theek hai okay and main aapko whatsapp pe message karta hun waha pe jo aapne barbari message kar haan barbari jo goat thi na sir uska details mere ko share kar dijiyega taki main usko yaha pe add kar saku barbari aap add kar do na sir barbari photo nahi main to click karunga sir haan photo mere ko doge photo price tabhi to main add karunga theek hai theek hai theek hai main aapka call close karta hun theek hai sir okay thank okay sir thank you okay
summary:
Concerns:

- Unable to see the number of buyleads left.

- Wants to know the remaining package validity.

- Wants leads from South India.

- Wants leads related to 'Bital'.



Resolution:

- Executive guided on how to check buylead balance.

- Informed about the number of buyleads available.

- Informed the customer about the package validity.

- Executive agreed to add 'barbari goat' to the catalog.

- Executive explained how to get leads of interest.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share details of 'barbari goat'.

- Executive will add 'barbari goat' to the catalog.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, catalog, leads
